title: What font is this PLEASE!!
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080430120214im_/http:/typophile.com/files/hlancet_5552.jpg)

 [‹ Serif Font I.D.](http://web.archive.org/web/20080430120214/http:/typophile.com/node/44201 "Go to previous forum topic") [ORWO East German Audio Cassette ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080430120214/http:/typophile.com/node/44234 "Go to next forum topic")
author: adwoolrich

comments.content: Where from? Possibly hand made. [Friz Quadrata](http://web.archive.org/web/20080430120214/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/paratype/friz_quadrata_regular_ot/?sample_text=HLANCET&sample_size=74) is similar.
